promptComposition.loreTemplate: It represents {summary} Axis: {axis}. Embodied feel: {feel}. Relational stance: {stance}. Scene: {scene}. Question: {question}.
promptComposition.framingInstructions: Vertical 2:3 tarot card composition, portrait orientation, centered subject framed head-to-toe with comfortable headroom, ornate tarot border, clean card edges, no cropping of hands or head.
promptComposition.description: Controls how the final prompt is assembled. Use {summary}, {axis}, {feel}, {stance}, {scene}, {question} as placeholders in loreTemplate. You can add/remove keys in compositionOrder; common keys include deckPrompt, deckLore, lore, lotm, tradition, framing.

gemini.requestPrefix: Generate a tarot card image based on this description: {prompt}. Aspect ratio: 2:3 (vertical tarot card).
gemini.photoInstruction: Use the provided reference photo to maintain the person's facial features and likeness.
gemini.description: Instructions sent to Gemini API. {prompt} will be replaced with the assembled prompt. {instruction} comes from reference image objects.

openrouter.description: OpenRouter uses the prompt directly without additional prefix
